entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
